page.title: 03Southill Primary School.
page.content: Our school is quite a{modern school it was{built only 12 years ago.} There are over 170 pupils in the school.Mr Pressley is our headmaster but he is retiring at the end of the year.There are{six classsrooms.}We have quite a{big hall and a Library. Outside we have{two playgrounds and {a football pitch.}There are also clubs for the children, such as badminton, football, athletics,gymnastics,cricket and music. There are{six teachers}and one headmaster the rest of the staff do other jobs. I am a second year junior and my teacher is Mr Sandercock.He is a very nice teacher and he is quite funny.I like him a lot. - Toby Hamilton.
